# ðŸ“Š Creature Database

This table allows you to search and filter creatures based on their attributes.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DT)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)

df <- read_csv("data.csv")
DT:::DT2BSClass(c('compact', 'cell-border'))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
df_filtered <- df %>% 
  select(-c("socialGroup", "faction", "range", "pvpBitmask", "creatureBitmask", 
            "templates", "lootGroups", "conversationTemplate", 
            "personalityStf", "optionsBitmask"))

datatable(df_filtered, filter = "top",
          extensions = c("Buttons", "ColReorder", "KeyTable"),
          options = list(
            dom = "Blfrtip",
            buttons = c("copy", "csv", "excel"),
            pageLength = 10,
            autoWidth = FALSE,
            scrollX = TRUE,
            searchHighlight = TRUE,
            lengthMenu = list(c(10, 25, 50, 100, -1),
                              c("10", "25", "50", "100", "All")),
            keys = TRUE,
            colReorder = TRUE
          ),
          escape = FALSE
        )
```
